features: 【Durable Material】 In-Drawer Knife Organizer 18-Slot(2PC 9-Slot)，made of natural rubber wood that is hard and durable, hygienic, and light with a burnish to satiny feel.

【Perfect Organizer】Knife Block Drawer Storage can be placed outside or into a drawer up to 3 inch depth. 18-slot knife storage holds most commonly used knives and accessories safely up to 15 inch long, clear up and save your counter space.
【Practical Design】Kitchen Knife Cutlery Holder with angled handle rest design, elevate handles for easy grabbing.
【Safety and Convenient】Reasonable space prevents the blades from coming out, keeps knives in place and safely sheathed.
【Measures】16.6 inch length, 2 inch height, 6.3 inch width; Holds up to 18 knives (Not Included); How to clean: wipe with cloth to clean, insert dry knives.
body.description: The Cook N Home In-Drawer rubber wood Knife Organizer, 9-Slot is made of natural rubber wood that is durable and looks great with a burnish to satiny feel.Rubber wood is hygienic, light, and harder than many types of wood. 9 slot storage holds most commonly used knives up to 9.5 inch and 15 inch long. Block can be placed into a drawer up to 3 inch depth, 7 inch width, 17 inch depth to save space and stay organized. Angled handle rest design, elevate handles for easy grabbing. Reasonable space prevents the blades from coming out, keeps knives in place and safely sheathed. Clear up and save your counter space. Wipe with cloth to clean.Measures: 16. 6 inch length, 2 inch height, 6.3 inch width.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functions as intended & Looks Great!
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent knife storage system made by Cook N Home. I bought two (2) of them to go in my drawer & they are a perfect fit for my Wüsthof Classic 20-Piece Knife Block Set and still left room for a few random pieces.This allowed me to securely store them securely in a drawer. By removing my knives from the knife block, I was able to free up valuable counter space.Some reviewers mentioned their meat cleaver didn't close in the drawer. Mine fit just fine, I just had to reverse it around in the drawer. This will also depend on how deep your drawer is as well as the size of your meat cleaver. Just be sure to measure the inside of your drawer & compare it to the dimensions in the listing.As far as a description goes, this item is made of bamboo, as stated. The bamboo looks as good as any other wood species. It is nice & smooth to touch & has a hefty weight to it. It functions as intended and looks good on display.If you need a safe place to store your knives, this one may be just what the butcher ordered! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This thing is such a great idea. As a guy who likes to cook a lot and hates the big block of knives on countertops, this thing has been awesome. Fits nicely in a drawer for my full knife set and keeps things organized and out of the way. It is durable and such a smooth finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wooden knife organizer
reviews.reviewText: Great price, awesome idea, good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Save your counter space! Get it!
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for nearly 3 years in 3 different houses (military). A long time ago I sold Cutco and purchased the set I used to demo to customers when I left the job. However, it didn't come with a knife block and we hardly ever have the counter space to store them anyway. This was a lifesaver! Instead of these expensive knives being loose in a drawer, my entire home maker set fits like a charm (not including the two carving forks).It looks perfect in my drawer next to our bamboo silverware organizer! Would buy again!I will say, when I first opened the package, there were bugs inside. I don't know if this happened when they packed it or while it was traveling. Per the instructions, I rinsed it in hot soapy water and let it air dry. I waited a few days to be sure before I used it. No problems since.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2019
reviews.reviewText: These are very nicely made knife storage blocks. I bought two so I could replace my large, countertop knife block, with something smaller and out of sight. This is universal, so it's larger than it needs to be (my longest knife is probably 8-9"), but there's plenty of room in the drawer. And I'm sure others have longer knives.There's room for six large knives on the bottom, and 5 smaller knives on the top (like steak knives or paring knives). This should really be 7 on the bottom and 6 on top, since most steak knives are sold in sets of 6.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit Perfectly and Works Great
reviews.reviewText: The measurements listed were accurate and it fit perfectly in my knife drawer. Now all my knives are organized and not piled on top of each other. I told a few family members how happy I am with this and they will also look for one. The storage block is very sturdy and has a very nice finish on it. For the price I was surprised by how nice it was. Definitely a great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tidy way to store your knives!
reviews.reviewText: Best invention ever in my opinion! I had a block holder for my knives and although at first it was nice, after a while it would get filled with dust and gunk and just looked pretty gross. I dont like clutter on my counters so a knife block wasnt really for me. I love this knife organizer and the way it stores all of my knives both big and small nice and tidy in a drawer! And its super sleek and modern, everyone loves it and thinks its super cool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Solution To Keep Counters Clear
reviews.reviewText: I was SO happy to find a knife storage solution that allowed me to keep my knives protected and organized without having them out on the counter. This in-drawer knife block fits perfectly in my silverware drawer next to my organizer, and it's big enough to use for all my knives. Highly recommend!
This is the ideal unit for older homes with smaller drawers. Good amount of slots for lots of knives and easily removed for cleaning. Great product!
Este portacuchillos es una idea buenísima... No todos los cuchillos que tenemos se compraron al mismo tiempo, con lo cual no contábamos con un portacuchillos, ademas este cabe perfecto en el cajón.
Works well. Removed counter top clutter with the previous stand up block. Can hide this in a drawer
Ayuda a tener en orden los cuchillos, a que no estén revueltos con el resto de utensilios. Sirve para cuchillos chicos y grandes.
Muy util, buena calidad y terminado
